trans-unit.source: Set Virtual Network Gateway Shared Key
trans-unit.target: Set Virtual Network Gateway Shared Key

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>Set Virtual Network Gateway Shared Key</embeddedLabel> operation configures the shared key that is used by the virtual network gateway to authenticate connections with individual sites on a virtual network.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>Set Virtual Network Gateway Shared Key</embeddedLabel> operation configures the shared key that is used by the virtual network gateway to authenticate connections with individual sites on a virtual network.

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>Set Virtual Network Gateway Shared Key</embeddedLabel> request is specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>Set Virtual Network Gateway Shared Key</embeddedLabel> request is specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;virtual-network-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the virtual network associated with the virtual network gateway, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;local-network-site-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the local network site associated with the shared key.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;virtual-network-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the virtual network associated with the virtual network gateway, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;local-network-site-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the local network site associated with the shared key.

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the request headers.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: The value for this header should be set to <userInput>2012-03-01</userInput> or higher.
trans-unit.target: The value for this header should be set to <userInput>2012-03-01</userInput> or higher.

trans-unit.source: For more information about versioning headers, see <link xlink:href="bb009293-529c-4793-b925-0f8701f337d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Versioning</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about versioning headers, see <link xlink:href="bb009293-529c-4793-b925-0f8701f337d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Versioning</link>.

trans-unit.source: The format of the request body is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the request body is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements in the response body.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements in the response body.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the shared key used by the gateway to authenticate connections to sites on a virtual network.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the shared key used by the gateway to authenticate connections to sites on a virtual network.

trans-unit.source: The value must be an alphanumeric string (a-zA-Z0-9) up to 128 characters long.
trans-unit.target: The value must be an alphanumeric string (a-zA-Z0-9) up to 128 characters long.

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code, a response body, and a set of response headers.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a response body, and a set of response headers.

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.
trans-unit.target: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.

trans-unit.source: The format of the response body is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the response body is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements in the response body:
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements in the response body:

trans-unit.source: To get more information about the status of an operation, such as whether it is still executing or complete, you can call <externalLink><linkText>Get Virtual Network Gateway Operation Status</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj154112.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> with the operation ID.
trans-unit.target: To get more information about the status of an operation, such as whether it is still executing or complete, you can call <externalLink><linkText>Get Virtual Network Gateway Operation Status</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj154112.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> with the operation ID.
